definitions.text: a blood vessel that carries blood from the capillaries toward the heart
examples: all veins except the pulmonary vein carry unaerated blood
he continued in this vein for several minutes

definitions.text: any of the vascular bundles or ribs that form the branching framework of conducting and supporting tissues in a leaf or other plant organ
a layer of ore between layers of rock
one of the horny ribs that stiffen and support the wing of an insect
